About me
With more than 3 years in iOS application development, lam able to complete projects
effiently and satisfy customers. Besides, also have a good background about
networking, computer hardware. My English is good enough to communicate, read
documents and I can understand Japanese at basic level .
Love travel by motorbike with friends, reading books, watching action movies and learn
new technologies.
o
Experience
2018 - present
iOS Developer @ Wata Solutions.
Take role in company's product development (WataGo, WataShoping, WataHotel .)
Being in charge of developing outsource projects.
2015 - 2018
iOS Developer @ BSP Company.
Take role in company's product development (Vieclamtaytrai Mobile App)
Being in charge of developing outsource projects.
iOS team leader.
